alert.note: Alert for Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lexington and northwestern Richland Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 845 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Prosperity to near Batesburg-Leesville. Movement was east at 30 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Irmo, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Red Bank, Oak Grove, St. Andrews, Ballentine, Chapin, Cedar Grove Fire Station, South Shore Marina, Oswald Park, Bundrick Island, Putnam`s Landing, White Rock, Murray, Rocky Point Recreation Area, Hollow Creek Public Park, Melvin Park, Lighthouse Marina and Lake Murray Marina. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 52 and 61. Interstate 26 between mile markers 90 and 104. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
